name: Johnny’s Tonic
description: Johnny’s Tonic is a sativa-dominant California strain bred by Elemental Seeds. It took home a 2014 Cannabis Cup award for its high CBD content inherited from Cannatonic.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Euphoric, Focused, Cramps, Inflammation, Fatigue, Nausea, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
